Epic views, elegant mansions and luxury hotels roll out the red carpet for tourists and locals alike. Crowning the hill, Huntington Park is heaven for dog-lovers and bookworms. Flex your meditation muscle at yoga class in Grace Cathedral, get the vintage vibe at the tiki-themed Tonga Room or unwind with a cocktail at divey favorite, the Hyde Out. Life in Nob Hill is pretty golden. Cable cars, they're not just for tourists! They're also for people lucky enough to live at 840 California. Hop a cable car to the Financial District, ride to the waterfront or shop in Union Square -- they're just outside your door. Inside this Nob Hill address you'll find views of downtown, beautiful hardwood floors, and oodles of kitchen space. Bright bay windows shed light on the open floor plan. bodytext_s: Contact info: show contact info | show contact info San Francisco Penthouse at The Royal! 201 Sansome St #1003, San Francisco, CA 94104 $7,500/mo KEY FEATURES Year Built: 1909 Sq Footage: 1450 sqft. Bedrooms: 2 Beds Bathrooms: 2.5 Baths Parking: None Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below) Deposit: $7,500 Pets Policy: No Pets Allowed Laundry: In Unit Property Type: Condo DESCRIPTION Exceptional 2 bed, 2.5 Bath penthouse unit with two levels. All stainless steel appliances, Brazilian hardwood floors, granite counter tops, and wine storage. Located at the corner of Sansome and Pine Streets in the true heart of the financial district. The landmark Royal Insurance Building was the first commercial building completed downtown after the 1906 quake. Designed by New York City Architects Howell and Stokes, the building features a Georgian Revival brick and stone exterior and imported Italian marble. In 2006, the building was converted to exquisite residential condos. This gorgeous building is home to 46 luxury residences collectively known as The Royal. Enjoy San Francisco's finest from this luxury penthouse at The Royal in the heart of the Financial District. Many of the City's finest attractions and eateries are within steps of your front door. Downtown San Francisco perspectives frame every room of the residence. The formal entry transitions to a livable open floor plan, a gracious entertaining space perfectly poised for intimate gatherings at home. A well-appointed gourmet kitchen and living and dining room combination comprise the main living areas, while a spacious half bath complete the first floor of the home. The master bedroom and ensuite bathroom, and second bed and bath offer restful private personal accommodations on the second floor. Handsome hardwood floors move throughout, with sleek bath tile, and natural stone countertops converging to emanate an atmosphere of quality throughout. Now known as The Royal, this treasured landmark was originally designed as an 11-story commercial building. Conceptualized by Heller Manus Architects, the building has been thoughtfully transformed into a 12-story residential building housing 46 luxury condominiums. The historical facade, entryway, lobby and stairway were all restored to their original magnificence, with the European marble and stone details of the interior common areas carefully conserved to retain the historic integrity of the building. A hallmark Financial District presence, The Royal was first known as the Royal Globe Insurance Building. Presently, the building is respectfully referred to as San Francisco Historic Landmark #160. Completed in 1909, this one of a kind residence also holds the distinction of being the first fully fire resistant building constructed after the 1906 earthquake. Many of the buildings original details were preserved with great appreciation for their original grandeur, while modern elements including additional storage and a common rooftop deck boasting stunning Downtown views were added to further enhance the building. A rare opportunity to enjoy a taste of historic City living balanced with the contemporary appeal of a newly renovated residence, this special property is perfectly poised as a launchpad for a blissful San Francisco Summer. RENTAL FEATURES Living room Dining room Master bath Pantry Basement Range / Oven Refrigerator Dishwasher Microwave Garbage disposal Stainless steel appliances Freezer Balcony, Deck, or Patio Garden Heat: forced air Central A/C Air conditioning Double pane / Storm windows High-speed internet Intercom system Hardwood floor Granite countertop High / Vaulted ceiling Skylights COMMUNITY FEATURES Vintage building Elevator Controlled access Near transportation LEASE TERMS Owner pays water, sewer, trash. Tenant pays PG&E, cable + internet Contact info: show contact info show contact info
title_s: Luxury penthouse in the heart of SF!

bodytext_s: 1 Bedroom Apartment Nob Hill $3695 | 1401 #410 Jones St San Francisco, CA 94109 Nob Hill was built by the barons of the Gold Rush, and today, it's just as iconic as ever. Epic views, elegant mansions and luxury hotels roll out the red carpet for tourists and locals alike. Crowning the hill, Huntington Park is heaven for dog-lovers and bookworms. Flex your meditation muscle at yoga class in Grace Cathedral, get the vintage vibe at the tiki-themed Tonga Room or unwind with a cocktail at divey favorite, the Hyde Out. Life in Nob Hill is pretty golden. . This classic Nob Hill apartment building is at the crossroads of some of the City's most visited attractions. Chinatown, with its colorful hodgepodge of souvenir shops, produce markets and restaurants is right at your doorstep. Beautifully updated kitchen, with mosaic backsplash and gas range may bring out your inner culinary adventurer -- ready for that durian dessert experiment? Hardwood floors and open door pet policy sweeten the deal. . bodytext_s: This 1880's 9 unit Victorian Apartment Building was extensively restored and looks like a bed and breakfast. Gorgeous Flowering Trees and lovely grounds. Also an oversized hallway which can easily accommodate a computer desk or dresser. 3 closets. There is a full remodeled bathroom with nice white ceramic tile and a shower over tub. Gas heating. bodytext_s: Address: 175 Bluxome Street #310 Neighborhood: Mission Bay Bedrooms: 2 BR Bathrooms: 2 BA Style: Live/Work Loft Parking: Assigned Security Deposit: 1.5 Months Lease Term: 1 Year Asking Rent: $4,495 Modern Live/Work Loft Close to Caltrain From the very first moment you enter 175 Bluxome, your senses will be enveloped. Feel the cool industrial tile as you pass through the entrance into the bamboo courtyard. Hear the sounds of the serene fountain as it lulls the urban jungle outside. Witness the shimmering bamboo as it sways gently in the wind, bringing a sense of the great outdoors inside. Surrounded by Caltrain, tech start-ups, AT&T Park, and the finest wine bars and restaurants, this exceptional live/work residence at 175 Bluxome creates an incomparably intimate and exclusive living experience in the heart of one of the world's most vibrant cities. With open floor plans and high ceilings, this loft-style 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condominium at 175 Bluxome is a very convenient floor plan. The master bedroom is on an upstairs sleeping mezzanine, with the guest bedroom or office/den on the main level for good separation of space. Other amenities include a large patio off the master bedroom; hardwood floors; a modern kitchen with black granite countertops, a stainless steel backsplash, and maple cabinetry; bathrooms with tile floors, maple cabinetry, and limestone countertops; in-unit laundry; and 1-car parking. Designed by San Francisco-based Mark Horton Architecture, 175 Bluxome is a modern 102-unit loft complex built in 1997 and updated by Emerald Fund in 2005. These lofts cluster around a landscaped central courtyard that offers a relaxing gathering place for residents. Amenities for loft homes at 175 Bluxome for all to enjoy include the glass-enclosed elevator (which is a standout feature of the courtyard), a water feature, trash deposits on each floor, a guard, on-site maintenance, and bicycle storage. You are perfectly situated in the heart of San Francisco. Located at the intersection of SOMA, South Beach, and Mission Bay, coveted amenities are all close by. From gourmet grocery stores and world-class dining to quaint corner cafes, you have an all-access pass to the best the city has to offer. Not to be under-played are the fine weather, convenience, and stimulation of the thriving SOMA neighborhood where you can work, play, wine, and dine in a banquet of eclectic offerings. The Embarcadero, Financial District, and Waterfront trails are all within easy reach. http://www.climbsf.com/for-rent/175-bluxome-st-310/ LISTING AGENT Kyle Algeo show contact info show contact info CalBRE 01805395

bodytext_s: Newly Remodeled Upscale Apartment nestled in the heart of San Francisco's most scenic and trendiest neighborhood! This beautiful and spacious apartment gracefully combines San Francisco traditional Victorian architecture with modern amenities and stylish design and offers spectacular views from every window! Both bedrooms have magnificent views of the San Francisco Bay and the Alcatraz Island while living room and dining room overlook beautiful green park. The apartment features 2 large bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms (one renovated full bathroom with a bathtub, another completely brand new full bathroom with a walk-in shower), 1 large sunny dining room, 1 cozy living room with fireplace, full kitchen, laundry room (with washer/dryer machines inside the apartment) and one storage room. The entire apartment features hardwood floors. Spacious living room with a fireplace in the center. Fully remodeled kitchen with granite countertops, dishwasher, microwave, oven, stove, refrigerator/freezer, and an abundance of dark cherry wood cabinets. Adjacent to the kitchen is a large, sunny dining room. Brand new bathrooms. Washer/dryer machines inside the apartment and storage space. There is a small garden outside in the backyard. Apartment is conveniently located near shops, delicious restaurants and public transportation, with a short walk to Ghirardelli square, Fisherman's Wharf, Aquatic Park, Marina Green at Fort Mason, North Beach, Union Street, Chestnut Street and many other cultural attractions and entertaining venues. The apartment is located literally just a short walk away from San Francisco premier entertainment, cultural, retail, and dining options as well as the epic views of San Francisco signature sights. The apartment is easily accessible by public transportation, with several bus and muni lines taking you to anywhere in the city. - Apartment is approximately 1400 sq. feet - 12-month lease - $6,200 per month - Street parking only with plenty of parking spaces in the area where this apartment is located (residential parking permit is a great option.) - Pets are welcome with an additional pet deposit - Available for rent immediately - Please note that this apartment is not suitable to convert into a 3-bedroom/shared by three roommates type due to the open space design of living/dining rooms

bodytext_s: Beautifully remodeled three level single family home in a perfect Presidio Heights location near the walking paths of the Presidio, Julius Kahn Playground, and Laurel Village. The house features 3+ bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, and is semi-detached, allowing maximum natural light in from three sides. The main level features a formal living room with fireplace and built in cabinetry, family room, dining room, half bath, and a gourmet kitchen equipped with a professional-grade Viking range, Bosch dishwasher, and Sub-Zero refrigerator. The top floor has three bedrooms and two full bathrooms, perfect for a family desiring the convenience of all bedrooms on one level. The master bath features dual sinks, subway tiling, heated floors, a deep soaking tub, and high-end fixtures. Both bedrooms have been fully remodeled with close attention to detail and are adjacent to a relaxing sunroom with a skylight and eastern views. The street level features a formal entry, two-car tandem garage, workout area with gym quality equipment, a bonus room with attached bath and backyard access. High ceilings, hardwood floors, dual paned windows, and extensive contemporary wainscoting throughout. Very rarely do homes of this quality and location become available. Furnished or unfurnished ok. Gardener and maid service are included in the rent. Dates flexible, longer term possible.
title_s: Remodeled/furnished 3+BR/3.5BA home in A+ Presidio Heights location

Be the first to occupy this luxurious, light, bright, and airy home in the convenience of the new Transbay neighborhood just blocks from the Embarcadero. Situated in Plaza A, the low-rise tower located on Main Street, Residence 3G is a spacious one bedroom with first-class features and finishes along with intuitive design touches for modern living. The open living space includes natural light from expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, and the inspired kitchen offers best-in-class Gaggenau appliances, premium Caesarstone quartz countertops, modern Siematic cabinetry, and premium fixtures. On the ground floor of LUMINA, The Market offers gourmet food and dining in the 9,500 sq. ft. retail space on the corner of Main and Folsom; this is their second SF incarnation after the flagship store under Twitter headquarters across from NEMA on 10th Street and Market. The Market boasts the best organic, local food for takeout and delivery to LUMINA residents. Enjoy a prime location close to San Francisco's Financial District, The Embarcadero, the Ferry Building, and the new Transbay Terminal. Easy access to BART/CAL TRAIN, 280 FWY & 101 FWY. Neighborhood: One of the most prominent features of South Beach is AT&T Park, home of the World Champion San Francisco Giants. The presence of this ballpark has enticed many new services and restaurants into the area, most notably chef Michael Mina's RN74, Ironside, and Tres. Wine bars also abound, like Local Kitchen & Wine Merchant and District Wine Bar. Since South Beach is a quick walk to the Ferry Building Marketplace, weekly shopping at the Farmer's Market is a must. On your way down the Embarcadero, check out Pat Kuleto's Waterbar and Epic Roasthouse. You'll be glad you did. bodytext_s: Next available Apartment scheduled to be available for a lease start of May 31st. Property address: 780 S. 11th Street, San Jose. Large, detail clean, 2 Bdrm with 2 FULL Bathroom apartment within short walk to San Jose State University campus. Open floor plan, large closets & lots of natural light from large windows. Showings are scheduled on a first-come, first-serve basis. Rent is $2,295.00 per month on a 1 year lease. For applicants wanting to secure a future move-in date in advance, call to schedule an appointment and for information about placing a holding deposit for an upcoming apartment, how to qualify, available lease start dates & rent rates. Initial terms are for one year. Be first to sign up for the future apartments coming available in June. A holding deposit placed for a specific apartment secures your selection in advance. Apartment showings are scheduled by appointment and holding deposits are accepted based on your overall qualifications and on a first-come/first-serve basis. Included with the rent are: Hot & Cold Water, Sewer, Trash & two (2) assigned parking spaces. Additional on-site parking or carport available if needed. Residents pay for their electricity, internet & T.V. The information below will provide you a very good idea of how this current Apt is appointed and prepared as follows: Kitchen has refrigerator & stove/oven & garbage disposer, upgraded homeowner quality carpeting and upgraded padding (8 lb./yd. density & 1/2 thickness) throughout, kitchen & bathroom flooring is Armstrong tough guard Vinyl, both bedrooms and the kitchen have ceiling fan/light fixture combinations (3 speeds each direction, up & down) , each bathroom has newer counters, spacious cabinet/vanities below & porcelain sinks & modern wall shelving in addition to mirrored medicine cabinets and larger wall mirrors. The front slider door has vertical blind window treatments. There is a good size living room closet for hanging cloths, storage, linen, etc. The bedrooms have lot's of natural light by larger windows with custom window treatments. The kitchen has attractive, light cherry finished cabinetry. Bedrooms dimensions are about 13'2 by 10' & 13'2 by 10'2, plus large size closets in each bedroom. Everything will work properly, be detail cleaned and in very good condition for your move in. Take a look and see for yourself. On site, there's a Main entrance privacy gate, coin-op laundry room or nearby public laundromats, bicycle racks, plenty of assigned on-site parking for you and nearby on-street parking for your family and guests. Additionally, this address qualifies for the S.U.N. street parking permits if you also want that option. Call to inquire about your particular interests/needs and make our next available apartment your new home. We are located in close proximity to vibrant downtown San Jose, just a short 3 to 4 block walk to the S. E. corner of the San Jose State University campus and with easy access to Highways 280, 101 and 87. This is a No Smoking property. No Section 8. No pets. Call Manager for further information. If Manager is unavailable at the time of your call, be sure to clearly leave your name and call back telephone number. We'll respond promptly. Thank You.

bodytext_s: Large, bright, charming, spacious bedroom in our unfurnished apartment. This apartment has a European feel, with high ceilings, beautiful wood floors, and ready for your decor! Enjoy the apartment to yourself most all of the time, as we are only here a couple nights every few weeks. *NO PETS ALLOWED* YOUR ROOM + Large bedroom that is the same size as ours. Has plenty of closet space, crown molding, hardwood floors, and other architectural details + Unfurnished RENT & DEPOSIT + $2800 monthly rent + $1400 DEPOSIT + Utilities not included THE APARTMENT + Hardwood floors + 14ft+ ceilings + Light filled with huge windows in each room + Large living room and dining room + One bathroom complete with soaking tub and overhead shower + Eat-in kitchen with pristine Wedgwood stove + LOTS of closet space, including a walk-in closet in the hall + Apartment comes entirely unfurnished except for our bedroom + Quiet, longterm neighbors who take a lot of pride in their homes and the building YOU We are looking for a single professional who is clean and friendly, with your party days long behind you. We would love to find someone who takes a lot of care in their home, is responsible, and is congenial. YOUR ROOMMATES We are a thirty-something, professional, married couple who have lived in and enjoyed this apartment. You would have the apartment all to yourself nearly all of the time. We keep this place because my work requires that I spend a couple nights every few weeks in San Francisco. My husband and I also enjoy an occasional weekend in the city. We are moving all of our furniture out of the place except for our bedroom. So you will need your own household furniture and kitchen supplies. THE NEIGHBORHOOD Our place is in a secure building, in the heart of San Francisco. This neighborhood has all the amenities you could want, including walking distance to Union Square, Downtown, Chinatown and the Ferry Building on one side and Russian Hill, Nob Hill, Japantown, Hayes Valley and SOMA on the other sides. Some of the city's best restaurants, cafes and bars are right outside the door. PUBLIC TRANSIT BART is a short walk away, with lots of major bus routes available on nearby blocks. But the neighborhood's location lends itself to making San Francisco utterly walkable!

bodytext_s: This is a very cool 2 bedroom beach residence in Rio Del Mar. The apartment is in an older Art Deco building with lots of character, and is completely renovated to modern standards. It's an upstairs unit in the rear of the building that shares only one wall so there are windows on three sides, with a small entry patio area outside the entry door. The apartment has Pergo wood floors and comes with hookups for an in-unit stackable washer and dryer. Inside, there is a nice kitchen with oak cabinets, tile countertops and a dishwasher and disposal. The bathroom has a tiled shower and vanity. One bedroom is good size with a large closet, the other is a little cozy with a smaller closet. Well located, you are literally living on the beach as it's only a few steps to the sand. You can feel the waves and hear the ocean wildlife and have the convenience of a small grocery, a deli, a coffee store and a lounge/restaurant just around the corner. Walk out your front door for early morning walks on the beach or sunsets over the cement ship at Seacliff State Beach. The hiking and biking trails of Nisene Marks State Park are a short walk away. A bus stop is just around the corner. The apartment is newly painted, clean and vacant for immediate occupancy. The rent is $2250 per month with a one year lease and includes water, both hot and cold, and a gardener. You pay for PG&E and trash pickup. The security deposit is $3200, fully refundable. Sorry, we are not accepting Section 8 or pets at this time. If you would like more information or want to schedule a showing please respond to this ad telling us a little about yourself or call John or Kathy at show contact info
title_s: Home on the beach - very nice apartment in Rio Del Mar

bodytext_s: Hi CL! Our spacious & sunny Nob Hill apartment is available for rent until August 1st. It is a 2BR 1BA apartment, but the family room can easily be converted into a 3rd bedroom - tenants have also used the larger of the two bedrooms as a double. The space has tons of natural light, as well as hardwood floors and crown molding throughout. The modern kitchen has expansive granite countertops, tile floors, and is equipped with all stainless steel appliances. There are marble floors in the bathroom with shower/tub and ample storage space. In addition, each bedroom has its own spacious closet and there is a hallway storage closet as well. Coin laundry is located in the basement and street parking is available with the general city parking pass. The location of the apartment is picturesque on top of the city with views of the Bay Bridge and Transamerica building from our street (and bedroom window). The Streetcar route comes up Jackson directly outside your front door. We are walking distance to Polk Street, Columbus/North Beach, Russian hill, Chinatown, Financial District, etc. The building is filled with a great combination of young professionals and families. Everyone is very respectful and quiet, plus the building is well constructed so sound does not carry from unit to unit. Monthly rent is $3800 - Please email/text to schedule showings. bodytext_s: I have a cozy 2 bedroom, 1.25 bath, FURNISHED victorian flat available on 12th and Lincoln Way. Unfortunately my flat has no garage, but street parking is available, although a pain if you plan on driving every day. This unit has one .75 bath, has a shower stall only, no tub so it is a .75 bath and one .5 bath with custom asian style bidets installed in both toilets! My flat will be available around July 3rd. Asian style home, so requesting shoes off! There is a locked hallway closet that I will use exclusively to store my stuff until I move back to the bay area. This hallway closet I am using will be locked, so you will not have access to it. I'm asking for $3500 including water and garbage (NO electric, gas, internet, cable TV etc.). First, last month and one month security deposit required. In the laundry room area, unfortunately there is a leak coming from the exterior wall siding not done correctly. I would kindly ask if you do rent my place, to help clean up the water leaking from the wall on to the floor during heavy rainy days. It will not be repaired for a while because our condo association just installed a new roof, so the cost of replacing the siding will take some time before we replenish our condo finances. This flat has a small backyard shared by 2 other owners upstairs (both professional couples). Furnished with 3 flat screen TV's (one TV with internet apps and one older 720p flat screen), and another relatively new 1080p flat screen I use as a computer monitor, one b&w laser printer, one inkjet printer, 5.1 stereo surround system, computer workstation desk I am really looking for a responsible couple who will take care of my home while I am away for a year and will give my old Victorian flat a lot of TLC. My flat is part of a 3 unit flat with my friends owning the 2 units above mine, so it would be great if you have easy-going and considerate.

bodytext_s: Why is it that wherever we are, home is what we long for most? On iTunes there are more than 100 songs with home in the title just to prove that point! We understand this at Valley Plaza, our community of Pleasanton, California apartments. We love our home and think you will love being a part of it too. This home retreat is a little piece of tranquility in the hustle and bustle of it all -- but still close enough to the necessities of life. If you are searching for apartments, Pleasanton, California is an ideal location, especially when you make Valley Plaza your home. Our residential community is so conveniently located, you can run most of your errands minutes away from your home! Whether you are craving a slurpee, need some groceries or have a letter to mail, satisfy your every whim in no time at all! Another home away from home is wonderful downtown Pleasanton, which offers a myriad of activities, including a farmer's market and street fair during the year. Check out their website at www.pleasantondowntown.net for the latest happenings! If you just like being a homebody, our Pleasanton apartments for rent are perfect for you. Our spacious one- and two-bedroom homes offer interesting details that set our community apart from the rest. Valley Plaza features a large pool with a sundeck and spa, saunas, tennis courts, a picnic area and a clubroom, all situated in a beautifully landscaped setting. If you have to leave home, you will enjoy convenient highway access to 680 and 580. Not to mention, the major airports are just a short drive away. We know, when you aren't home though, you will be singing Paul Simon's song . . . Homeward bound, I wish I was, Homeward bound. Sing away and know that we understand your need for home at this inviting community of apartments for rent in Pleasanton. We are a few blocks from the 280 freeway, as well as the Balboa Park BART and MUNI station. The 280 can take you to SFO in about 15 minutes, Silicon Valley about 30 minutes, San Jose about 50 minutes and downtown in about 10. Similarly, BART can take you to the Mission District in 6 minutes, Powell station in 12 and Embarcadero in 15 MUNI light rail lines J, K, and bus lines 29, 43, 8x, 54, and the 14 (which runs all night), are short walking distances to make this location easy access to anywhere in the City and Bay Area. Featuring dimensions of 100' x 40' and six lanes, Balboa Pool has long been one of the city's most popular sites for recreational and lap swims. Balboa Park is a neighborhood and public park created in 1909 and recently renovated. Inside of the park there is a a children's playground, a stadium, baseball diamonds, tennis courts. The only public soccer-specific stadium, Boxer Stadium, is located within Balboa Park.
